title: Module 4 Pt 1: Extension for Climate-Smart Agriculture

tasks.task: Understand the role of agricultural extension and its importance in addressing sustainability challenges.
subtasks: Describe agricultural extension as the application of new knowledge from applied scientific research to agricultural practices.
Emphasize the two-way communication between researchers and farmers facilitated by extension services.
Highlight the necessity of strong relationships and cooperation among farmers, extension professionals, researchers, and government levels (federal, state, local) in extension service delivery.
Recognize extension's role as a central component in facilitating complex sustainability challenges such as climate change adaptation and mitigation.
